package.title: Sparrow C4A Manager

descriptions.description: An alternative manager for Compo4all profiles. Features: * Creating, Editing and Deleting C4A profiles * Viewing C4A highscores Update 1.0.3.3: Changed appdata to c4a-mame appdata to create c4a-prof if needed Update 1.0.3.4: Little bug fixes Update 1.0.4.0: Possibility to submit cached scores Update 1.0.4.1: Fixed crash for minislug Update 1.0.4.2: Fixed timeout handling for large cache Update 1.0.4.3: Fixed bug with scrolling and speed it up Update 1.0.5.0: Showing filtered view and rank Update 1.0.5.1: Bug fix for submitting so many score, that 15 seconds are not enough Update 1.0.5.2: Feature request: Not using (X) to exit anymore ;) Update 1.0.5.3: Obviously did nobody ever try to delete an account... Update 1.0.6: Caching of the game list for shitty connections Update 1.0.6.1: Time out increases after failed connection
